mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiangmu_id as xiangmuId ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.jianzaojindu_uuid_number as jianzaojinduUuidNumber ,a.jianzaojindu_name as jianzaojinduName ,a.jianzaojindu_types as jianzaojinduTypes ,a.jianzaojindu_zhengchang_number as jianzaojinduZhengchangNumber ,a.jianzaojindu_xianzai_number as jianzaojinduXianzaiNumber ,a.jianzaojindu_file as jianzaojinduFile ,a.jianzaojindu_time as jianzaojinduTime ,a.jianzaojindu_content as jianzaojinduContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
